institution: Board of Trustees of Illinois State University
award_title: RUI: Harnessing Machine Learning Techniques for Atomic and Molecular Collisions
subject: Building tools your trainees will be proud of
body:
Hi Allison,

Your lab's work on collision physics with ML sounds like it's producing some really useful computational models. Here's the thingâ€”when that code and those neural networks live in a paper's appendix, your students' contributions kind of disappear with it.

Ouro helps you publish working tools so they actually get used elsewhere. When someone applies your models to a new problem, your trainees get credit and visibility for the real impact they built.

Worth a quick conversation?

Best,
Matt

Matt Moderwell
https://ouro.foundation
